data.title: Tajinderpal Saraon, MD
data.meta_description: Meet doctor Tajinderpal Saraon, MD, Heart Failure Doctor, and learn about conditions treated, training, and research at NYU Langone. Read more.
data.text:
NYU Langone Provider

Specialty: Heart Failure

Treats: Adults

Languages: English, Hindi

Phone: 646-501-0119

Schedule Appointment

The information entered on this page will not be used to send unsolicited email, and will not be sold to a third party.

About Me

Conditions and Treatments

Conditions

abnormal heart rhythms

acute respiratory failure

atrioventricular septal defect

cardiomyopathy & heart failure

coronary artery disease

heart failure with preserved ejection fraction

pulmonary hypertension

takotsubo syndrome

Treatments

cardiac catheterization

heart transplant

left ventricular assist device

right heart catheterization

Credentials

Positions

Assistant Professor, Department of Medicine at NYU Grossman School of Medicine

Director, CardioMEMS Program

Board Certifications

American Board of Internal Medicine (Adv Heart Failure & Transplant Cardio), 2016

American Board of Internal Medicine (Cardiovascular Disease), 2012

Education and Training

Fellowship, NYU School of Medicine, Advanced Heart Failure and Transplant, 2015

Fellowship, SUNY Downstate Medical Center, Cardiovascular Disease, 2012

Residency, SUNY Downstate Medical Center, Internal Medicine, 2008
